Terms and conditions

‚Ä¢ The monthly fee should be paid by the 10th of the month.

‚Ä¢ Do not bring any ornaments to the gym.

‚Ä¢ Gym trainer should be contacted if there are any complaints.

‚Ä¢ If you want to be absent for more than three days, you should report it or else the admission will be considered canceled.

‚Ä¢ The abuser will be expelled from the gym.

‚Ä¢ Don't abuse other members of the gym.

‚Ä¢ Keep the gym material in place after your exercise.

‚Ä¢ Once admitted, the fee will not be refunded under any circumstances.

‚Ä¢ Gym membership is not transferable.
